title: Ticket #5543: personal condor looking in /home/condor
description:
I've been having this problem for a while, but it's only just now that I decided to investigate. I was seeing four lines of error messages before the daemon banner for all of daemons. Two of them were the default local config directory (that is, $(LOCAL_DIR)/config) not existing. It's unfortunate that there's two messages for the same problem, and that they show up even if I didn't specifically request a config directory, but it's at least something I can resolve by creating that directory.

The other two are similar, but failing on /home/condor/config, which I can't (as a normal user) test. This shouldn't be happening (see above), but certainly shouldn't be being checked since I have CONDOR_CONFIG set in the environment.
